name: Sumac and Mint Aioli
description: Creamy aioli gets a flavor upgrade with sumac and mint. A perfect condiment for grilled vegetables, meat, and sandwiches.
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon zest and 1 teaspoon juice from 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: Combine aioli, sumac, mint, lemon zest, and lemon juice in a small bowl and stir until roughly combined. Drizzle with olive oil and serve with grilled vegetables, meats, or sandwiches. Aioli can be stored in a sealed container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
